description: This file defines an abstract class 'Wrapper' used in code generation for different programming languages, managing context, masks, and variables in the code generation process.

classes.name: Wrapper
classes.description: An abstract class serving as a base for code generation wrappers, holding context, language, section masks, and variable references.

methods.name: getVariable
methods.description: Abstract method to retrieve the BaseVariable associated with this wrapper.

methods.name: getSectionMask
methods.description: Returns the section mask indicating sections this wrapper is referenced by.

methods.name: getLanguageMask
methods.description: Returns the language mask indicating languages to generate.

methods.name: isInList
methods.description: Indicates whether the wrapper is part of a list.

methods.name: isInMap
methods.description: Indicates whether the wrapper is part of a map.
